title: Manage Truck Loading at Terminal
description: A terminal operator manages the process of a tanker truck arriving, loading gasoline, and departing from the loading rack.

tasks.description: A truck arrives. Scan the driver's ID and the order number to authorize entry and pull up the loading details.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver and order are validated, and the system assigns them to an available loading bay.

tasks.description: Initiate the loading process, ensuring the correct product and volume are loaded and all safety connections are made.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck is loaded with the specified amount of gasoline safely.

tasks.description: Finalize the transaction, print the Bill of Lading (BOL), and log the truck's departure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The transaction is completed, a BOL is generated, and the truck exits the terminal.
